Youssouf Coulibaly (amụrụ na Jenụwarị 2, 1993) bụ onye Mali na-emepụta nwa bebi, na onye na-akọ akụkọ si Mali.
A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri, nke nwere mgbọrọgwụ Bamana, ọ malitere mmalite ya na ihe nkiri na ihe oyiyi mgbe ọ dị afọ iri dị ka onye na-amụ ọrụ n'aka nna ya
O mechara mụọ nka na Institut National des Arts de Bamako, na ihe nkiri nwa bebi na Ecole Nationale Supérieure des Arts de la Marionnette na Charleville-Mézières, France.

N'afọ 1980, o guzobere ụlọ ọrụ nwa bebi nke ya, Sogolon Puppet Troupe, ma kemgbe ahụ ọ ghọrọ onye isi na-elekọta ọdịnala nwa bebi Bambara, nke kacha ochie na nke kacha baa ọgaranya n'omenala nwa bebi Africa. Coulibaly bụ onye na-elekọta nnukwu nchịkọta ụmụ bebi, ọtụtụ n'ime ha abịala ya site n'ezinụlọ ya
N'ikwu okwu banyere mmasị ya, Coulibaly kwuru, sị:
Ana m adabere na ụmụ bebi, ezinụlọ m na-ebi naanị maka nke a
Nke a bụ ụlọ akụ m, nke a bụ ókèala m, nke ahụ bụ akwụkwọ m, nke ọ bụ ókèala mụ niile na kwa ụbọchị Chineke na-enye anyị.
Coulibaly emeela ihe nkiri ọhụrụ na nke dị ike nke sitere na ọdịnala oge ochie nke ime ihe nkiri na West Africa
Ihe ngosi ya na-agụnye akụkọ ọdịnala na akụkọ mgbe ochie na ihe omume sitere na nnukwu akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Mali, yana akụkọ ihe mere na nkọwa banyere ndụ nke oge a na Mali
Usoro ndị ọ na-eme n'egwuregwu ya gụnyere ụmụ bebi aka, ụmụ bebi osisi, ụmụ beji, ihe nkpuchi na egwu dị ndụ
Sogolon emeela ihe ngosi na Europe na USA. E gosipụtara nhọrọ nke nchịkọta ụmụ bebi a na Germany, South Africa na USA.
